::Spears/Shadow Wing::

Spears::
"You two get back here ASAP OK? if there is an attack, we will need 
all the help we can get." She walked down and started welding the 
sides of the hull.

Shadow Wing:;
"Take care you too. Lunar, if anything happens to you this time, your 
wolf tail is mine, got it?" she said with a slight chuckle as she 
said it. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Lunarpine grinned,"Alright, I'll sign us out a pod and we can be on 
> our way." The wolfbot had mixxed emotions about the new bot but 
> decided he'd do anything to get away from the monotany of repair 
> duty. 
> 
> He found a pod, activated its start up procedure, logged in that 
the 
> two bots were taking it.
> "Ok RebelYell we're all set come aboard and we'll be off."
> 
> He opened a comm to Shadow Wing and Spears "Take good care of the 
> place you two." he wanted to invite Shadow Wing along but the 
thought 
> wasn't practicle. Rebelyell and Lunarpine could handle the pod.
>
